docs.text: Vala.ai FAQ What is Vala? Vala is a platform for peer-to-peer prediction markets running on Bitcoin SV. What is an Oracle? Oracles create and resolve markets. Anybody can become an oracle.
docs.title: Vala.ai FAQ
